mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PHIP_MEDICAL_STAFF_INFO ( EXTENSION_ID, NAME, GENDER_CODE, GENDER_NAME, BIRTH_TIME, BIRTHPLACE_ADDR, ID_NO, TECHNICAL_CODE, TECHNICAL_NAME, EMPLOYER_ADDR, EMPLOYER_TEL_NO, EFFECTIVE_TIME_LOW, EFFECTIVE_TIME_HIGH, AFFILIATED_ORG_CODE, AFFILIATED_ORG_NAME, MSG_ID, ASSIGNED_CODE, ASSIGNED_NAME, ASSIGNED_DEPT_CODE, ASSIGNED_DEPT_NAME, ASSIGNED_CONTACT_PERSON, STATUS_CODE, CREATION_TIME, )
SELECT #{item.extensionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.genderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.genderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.birthplaceAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.technicalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.technicalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.employerAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.employerTelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.effectiveTimeLow,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.effectiveTimeHigh,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.affiliatedOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.affiliatedOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assignedCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assignedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assignedDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assignedDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assignedContactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO PHIP_MEDICAL_STAFF_INFO ( EXTENSION_ID, NAME, GENDER_CODE, GENDER_NAME, BIRTH_TIME, BIRTHPLACE_ADDR, ID_NO, TECHNICAL_CODE, TECHNICAL_NAME, EMPLOYER_ADDR, EMPLOYER_TEL_NO, EFFECTIVE_TIME_LOW, EFFECTIVE_TIME_HIGH, AFFILIATED_ORG_CODE, AFFILIATED_ORG_NAME, MSG_ID, ASSIGNED_CODE, ASSIGNED_NAME, ASSIGNED_DEPT_CODE, ASSIGNED_DEPT_NAME, ASSIGNED_CONTACT_PERSON, STATUS_CODE, CREATION_TIME, ) VALUES( #{extensionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{genderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{genderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{birthplaceAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{technicalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{technicalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employerAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employerTelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectiveTimeLow,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{effectiveTimeHigh,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{affiliatedOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{affiliatedOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignedCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignedDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignedDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignedContactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
)

delete from PHIP_MEDICAL_STAFF_INFO where ID in
#{item.id}

update.foreach:
update PHIP_MEDICAL_STAFF_INFO
EXTENSION_ID = #{item.extensionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER_CODE = #{item.genderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER_NAME = #{item.genderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTH_TIME = #{item.birthTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BIRTHPLACE_ADDR = #{item.birthplaceAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NO = #{item.idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TECHNICAL_CODE = #{item.technicalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TECHNICAL_NAME = #{item.technicalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYER_ADDR = #{item.employerAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYER_TEL_NO = #{item.employerTelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFFECTIVE_TIME_LOW = #{item.effectiveTimeLow,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EFFECTIVE_TIME_HIGH = #{item.effectiveTimeHigh,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AFFILIATED_ORG_CODE = #{item.affiliatedOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AFFILIATED_ORG_NAME = #{item.affiliatedOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSG_ID = #{item.msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_CODE = #{item.assignedCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_NAME = #{item.assignedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_DEPT_CODE = #{item.assignedDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_DEPT_NAME = #{item.assignedDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_CONTACT_PERSON = #{item.assignedContactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_CODE = #{item.statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_TIME = #{item.creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATE = #{item.state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_AT=sysdate
where id = #{item.id};
